recipe.recipe_name: Grilled Chicken Salad with Strawberry Vinaigrette
recipe.ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, 6 cups mixed salad greens, 1 cup sliced strawberries, 1/4 cup slivered almonds, toasted, 1/4 red onion, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, 1/2 teaspoon honey, Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe.directions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper; grill until cooked through, about 6 minutes per side. Let cool, then slice into strips. In a large bowl, combine salad greens, sliced strawberries, slivered almonds, and red onion. In a small bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, olive oil, Dijon mustard, and honey for the dressing. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Pour dressing over salad and toss to coat. Divide salad onto plates and top with sliced grilled chicken and crumbled feta cheese. Serve immediately.
recipe.nutrition: Calories 295, Total fat 15g, Protein 29g, Cholesterol 65mg, Total carbohydrate 12g, Dietary fiber 3g, Sugars (natural) 6g, Sodium 320mg, Trans fat 0g, Potassium 567mg
